Name: Concealed Weapon
Ingredients: 30 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Absinthe is the 'weapon' in this full-on short berry drink.
History: Created in 2000 by Danny Smith at Che, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Concealed Weapon contains 282 calories
